nodes.text: The Daughters of the Ffib were an autocratic, exclusively female religious order, active during the last decades of the Galactic Republic.
A sect of the Order of the Ffib based on Lorahn, they established a mission on the Forest Moon of Endor, in an attempt to bring the native Ewoks into the order.
When Reess Kairn destroyed the Grand Temple, the Daughters of the Ffib employed Aurra Sing to hunt down Reess Kairn and eliminate him.
